contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Xperience by Kentico is the latest iteration of Kentico’s line of content and digital experience management platforms. Built from the ground up using modern technologies, it offers a future-proof architecture and introduces major changes from previous versions of Kentico Xperience.
ABC
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.4.1]
* .NET version: \[8|9]
* Execution environment: \[SaaS|Private cloud (Azure/AWS/Virtual machine)]
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
